data.title: Neil Young & Crazy Horse Tickets
data.meta_description: Neil Young & Crazy Horse on 20 May 2024 at Budweiser Stage in Toronto, Ontario. Tickets available. Click here to find out more.
data.meta_site_name: Budweiser Stage - Latest Events, Information & Tickets. Independent Guide not affiliated with Live Nation & Labatt Breweries of Canada. This site is not a box office or venue.
data.text:
Prepare for 60s-type rock rhythms as Neil Young and Crazy Horse lit up the live stages for their “Love Earth Tour” on Monday, 20th of May, at Budweiser Stage, Toronto, Canada. Ten years after their last national tour, Neil Young and Crazy Horse, consisting of Nifs Lofgren, Billy Talbot, and Ralph Molina, are rocking the road over again with their 16-date tour for the diehard Horses that is ready to jam. Announcing their newest live album, “Fu##in' Up,” they will showcase their noise rock fused with synth-pop as this album is a collection of their musical glory from their 50 years of domination in the music scene. Also hitting their best tracks, including "Cinnamon Girl" and "Down By The River," the rock and roll vibes will be off the charts as the long-time collaborators bring their musical angst in front of the fans. Let's join the parade as the Horses go crazy all night with Neil Young, and Crazy Horse delivers the rock-filled experience, no doubt! Grab your tickets now!

The rock vibes are rolling to Toronto’s stands as Neil Young and Crazy Horse resurfaces the old-school tunes with their “Love Earth Tour" on Monday, 20th of May, at Budweiser Stage, Toronto, Canada. Folk and grungy musicality is set for this stand-out live concert, with the idiosyncratic tunes of Neil Young and garage-band-type Crazy Horse sound leading the celebration.

Following their decade-long hiatus in road tours, Neil Young and Crazy Horse are making a huge return as they hit the road with a 16-date tour, having its stop in Toronto for a jump-packed musical experience through the roofs. With their timeless hits from their glory days in the 60s, their folk-based style of rock music will light up the atmosphere as they showcase their amazing vocals and energy-driven performances to fans present.

The greatest runs of Neil Young's long career are with the band Crazy Horse. Jamming with the one-man vocal rock virtuoso, Crazy Horse also made their name as a roots type of rock band that made its noise in California. From the release of their self-titled album in 1971 up to the creation of Neil Young's greatest gem, "Harvest," the long-time collaborators are still making it best with their timeless and dynamic musicality that has no contest. Eventually, Young was awarded Rock & Roll Hall of Fame for his great contribution to the rock scene, along with his several awards in the Grammy and Juno Awards. Currently, they are preparing to release their latest album, "Fu##in' Up," and are planning an anticipated nationwide tour for the solid and diehard fans out there. The album's tracklist features 9 songs including:

City Life (Country Home)

Feels Like a Railroad (River of Pride) (White Line)

Heart of Steel (Fuckin’ Up)

Broken Circle (Over and Over)

Valley of Hearts (Love to Burn)

Farmer John

Walkin’ in My Place (Road of Tears) (Mansion on the Hill)

To Follow One’s Own Dream (Day That Used to Be)

A Chance on Love (Love and Only Love)

“Love Earth Tour" by Neil Young and Crazy Horse will be held on the infamous Budweiser Stage in Toronto. This massive venue is full of concert-friendly features, including its world-class acoustics, state-of-the-art lighting and sound systems, and majestic stage production that is suited for this all-out rock concert. Everyone is invited to this all-time musical event as Neil Young and Crazy Horse jump in for a thrilling rock-inspired musical experience you will never forget. Grab your tickets now!
